original_text: Then he took the seven loaves and the fish in his hands and he thanked God for them. Then he broke the bread and the fish into pieces and he gave the food to his disciples. The disciples gave the food to the people.
korean_text: 떡 일곱 개와 그 생선을 가지사 축사하시고 떼어 제자들에게 주시니 제자들이 무리에게 주매

sentences.original_text: Then he took the seven loaves
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 그가 빵 일곱 개를 들고

sentences.original_text: and the fish in his hands
and he thanked God for them
and he gave the food to his disciples
The disciples gave the food to the people
